title: DMC - Deadlock Macro Creator
tutorial_instructions: The macro has been copied to your clipboard. To use it in Deadlock:
tutorial_steps: Open the console in Deadlock (press F7 or ~).
Paste the macro in the console and press Enter.
Use the assigned key to execute the macro in-game.
key_not_mapped: This key is not mapped in AZERTY.
assign_key_before_macro: Please assign a key before generating the macro.
